resources.string: To calibrate the sensitivity of the shake-up phone until you hear a beep. For information: too small amplitude will be ignore, because the phone can create it by the vibration on the call.
For calibration you must switch on the program. Just click to button for state ON
The phone rang at the wrong time and in your head only one thought - how to mute it as soon as possible? Shake the phone, pop in a pocket or shake the bag - make phone silent for a moment!
